foo

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • foo.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds an edge of a piece. Algorithm keeps a collection of unused edges in particular iteration to find another fit. Basically these are just 'pointers' to sides of pieces.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Sassa
